languages.text: "Что ж, тогда добро пожаловать в охотничьи угодья Кетца Темера!" {n}Дикий огонек разгорается в глазах Каллигоса, когда он обводит рукой небольшую поляну.{/n} "Все здесь от края до края заполонили мерзкие ксеносы. Я не жадный — трофеев хватит на всех".

traits.locale_text: "Что ж, тогда добро пожаловать в охотничьи угодья Кетца-аль Хета!" {n}Дикий огонек разгорается в глазах Каллигоса, когда он обводит рукой небольшую поляну.{/n} "Все здесь от края до края заполонили мерзкие ксеносы. Я не жадный — трофеев хватит на всех".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Well then, welcome to the Quetza Temer hunting grounds!" {n}A wildfire lights in Calligos's eyes as he gestures around.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there are enough trophies for everyone."
languages.original_text: "Что ж, тогда добро пожаловать в охотничьи угодья Кетца Темера!" {n}Дикий огонек разгорается в глазах Каллигоса, когда он обводит рукой небольшую поляну.{/n} "Все здесь от края до края заполонили мерзкие ксеносы. Я не жадный — трофеев хватит на всех".

traits.locale_text: "Great, welcome to the Quetza Temera hunting grounds!" {n}A wild fire lights in Calligos's eyes as he circles a small field with his hand.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there's enough trophies for everyone."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Great, welcome to the Quetza Temera hunting grounds!" {n}A wild fire lights in Calligos's eyes as he circles a small field with his hand.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there's enough trophies for everyone."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Great, welcome to the Quetza Temer hunting grounds!" {n}A wildfire lights in Calligos's eyes as he circles a small field with his hand.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there are enough trophies for everyone."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Well then, welcome to the Quetza Temer hunting grounds!" {n}A wildfire lights in Calligos's eyes as he gestures around.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there are enough trophies for everyone."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: "Well then, welcome to the Quetza Temer hunting grounds!" {n}A wildfire lights in Calligos's eyes as he gestures around.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there are enough trophies for everyone."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: «¡En ese caso, {mf|bienvenido|bienvenida} al coto de caza de Quetza Temer!». {n}Un fuego salvaje arde en la mirada de Calligos mientras señala a su alrededor.{/n} «Todo lo que hay aquí, de uno a otro confín, está abarrotado de detestables xenos. No soy una persona avariciosa; hay suficientes trofeos para todos».
languages.original_text: "Well then, welcome to the Quetza Temer hunting grounds!" {n}A wildfire lights in Calligos's eyes as he gestures around.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there are enough trophies for everyone."

traits.locale_text: «¡Estupendo, {mf|bienvenido|bienvenida} al coto de caza de Quetza Temer!». {n}Un fuego salvaje arde en la mirada de Calligos mientras señala a su alrededor trazando un círculo con la mano.{/n} «Todo lo que hay aquí, de uno a otro confín, está abarrotado de detestables xenos. No soy una persona avariciosa; hay suficientes trofeos para todos».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: “很好，欢迎来到格扎尔特默狩猎场！”{n}卡里戈斯比了个手势，眼睛里闪烁着野火般的光芒。{/n}“从这里，一边到另一边，到处都是可恶的异形。我不会吃独食，咱们每个人都能得到足够多的战利品。”
languages.original_text: "Well then, welcome to the Quetza Temer hunting grounds!" {n}A wildfire lights in Calligos's eyes as he gestures around.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there are enough trophies for everyone."

traits.locale_text: “那太好了，欢迎来到格扎尔特默狩猎场！”{n}卡里戈斯用手圈出一小块野地，眼睛里闪烁着野火般的光芒。{/n}“从这里，一边到另一边，到处都是可恶的异形。我不会吃独食，咱们每个人都能得到足够多的战利品。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: « Parfait ! Bienvenue sur le terrain de chasse de Quetza Temer ! » {n}Une lueur sauvage brille dans les yeux de Calligos tandis qu'il désigne les alentours.{/n} « Toute cette zone grouille de misérables xénos. Je ne suis pas égoïste, il y a suffisamment de trophées pour nous deux. »
languages.original_text: "Well then, welcome to the Quetza Temer hunting grounds!" {n}A wildfire lights in Calligos's eyes as he gestures around.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there are enough trophies for everyone."

traits.locale_text: « Magnifique ! Bienvenue sur le terrain de chasse de Quetza Temer ! » {n}Une lueur sauvage brille dans les yeux de Calligos tandis qu'il désigne un petit champ.{/n} « Toute cette zone grouille de misérables xénos. Je ne suis pas égoïste, il y a suffisamment de trophées pour nous deux. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: 「それでは、ケツァ・テメルの狩猟場へようこそ！」{n}ジェスチャーを交えるカリゴスの目に荒々しい火が灯る。{/n}「ここの端から端まで、すべてが憎むべき異種族で埋め尽くされている。俺は貪欲ではない…皆のために十分な戦利品がある」
languages.original_text: "Well then, welcome to the Quetza Temer hunting grounds!" {n}A wildfire lights in Calligos's eyes as he gestures around.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there are enough trophies for everyone."

traits.locale_text: 「素晴らしい、ケツァ・テメルの狩猟場へようこそ！」{n}小さな平野を手で示しながら、カリゴスの目に荒々しい火が灯る。{/n}「ここの端から端まで、すべてが憎むべきゼノで埋め尽くされている。俺は貪欲ではない…皆のために十分な戦利品がある」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Nun, dann willkommen im Jagdrevier auf Quetza Temer!" {n}Ein Buschfeuer lodert in Calligos' Augen und er breitet die Arme aus, um die Umgebung zu präsentieren.{/n} "Alles hier, von einem Rand zum anderen, ist voll verabscheuungswürdiger Xenos. Ich bin nicht gierig. Es gibt genügend Trophäen für alle."
languages.original_text: "Well then, welcome to the Quetza Temer hunting grounds!" {n}A wildfire lights in Calligos's eyes as he gestures around.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there are enough trophies for everyone."

traits.locale_text: "Wunderbar, willkommen im Jagdrevier auf Quetza Temer!" {n}Ein Buschfeuer lodert in Calligos' Augen, als er ein kleines Feld mit seiner Hand umkreist.{/n} "Alles hier, von einem Rand zum anderen, ist voll verabscheuungswürdiger Xenos. Ich bin nicht gierig. Es gibt genügend Trophäen für alle."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: "Peki o hâlde, Quetza Temer av bölgelerine hoş geldin!" {n}Etrafı işaret ederken Calligos'un gözlerinde vahşi bir yangın parlıyor.{/n} "Bir ucundan diğer ucuna dek buradaki her şey, iğrenç zenolarla dolu. Açgözlü değilimdir. Burada herkese yetecek kadar ganimet var."
languages.original_text: "Well then, welcome to the Quetza Temer hunting grounds!" {n}A wildfire lights in Calligos's eyes as he gestures around.{/n} "Everything here, from edge to edge, is filled with detestable xenos. I am not greedy — there are enough trophies for everyone."
